project1.title: Sorting Hat
project1.description: Single-page app which replicates the Sorting Hat concept from Harry Potter. Add students and sort them into random houses, then expel the bad ones to Voldermort's army.
project1.technologiesUsed: HTML, CSS, Vanilla JavaScript, GitHub Version Control

project2.title: Bear Tracker
project2.description: Single-page app for tracking bears and their fishing records. Individual records with timestamps of catches and failures. Fattest Bear Awards tracks bears with most fish caught.
project2.technologiesUsed: HTML, CSS, Vanilla JavaScript, GitHub Version Control

project3.title: Chatty
project3.description: Group project. Single-page app that simulates a chatroom with multiple users. Messages are added and deleted per 'user'.  Bonus features: theme change and large text options.
project3.technologiesUsed: HTML, CSS, Vanilla JavaScript, GitHub Version Control, Webpack
